Comments_List: Great fundamental understanding of structure based drug design and the tools used in the process. Also, knowledge of clinical trials and the path from the lab into the clinic as well as examples of what can go wrong and how to think about those types of problems.

Great course for someone with basic understanding of biology and drug discovery. HIC meeting could be structured better with a reflective discussion session after. It was nice to sit in but would have been nice to be able to ask questions after.
Yes, the professor is really nice and the content in class is rather practical and useful.
